LanguageData.PauseOtherSettlements_Tooltip: If enabled, other settlements (non-current map and non-anomaly layers) will be paused. Disabling this will allow all other settlements to simulate.
LanguageData.PauseNewSettlementsByDefault_Tooltip: If checked, any newly created settlement will automatically be set to 'paused'.
LanguageData.PauseNewAnomalyLayersByDefault_Label: Pause new anomaly layers by default
LanguageData.PauseNewAnomalyLayersByDefault_Tooltip: If checked, newly discovered anomaly layers will be paused by default.
LanguageData.PauseAnomalyLayersWhenAway_Tooltip: If checked, pocket maps (anomaly layers) will be automatically paused when you are not viewing their parent settlement.\n*This feature consumes a small amount of ticks.
LanguageData.PauseTab_SettlementTooltip: Check to pause simulation for this settlement.
LanguageData.PauseTab_CurrentSettlementEditableToolti: You can preset the pause state for this settlement. However, the currently viewed map will always be simulated regardless of this setting.
LanguageData.PauseTab_AnomalyLayerTooltip: Check to pause simulation for this anomaly layer.
LanguageData.PauseOngoingJobs_Tooltip: If enabled, pawns on non-simulated maps will pause their current jobs.
LanguageData.PauseHealth_Tooltip: If enabled, health-related processes (like disease progression, immunity gain, and healing) will be paused for pawns on non-simulated maps.
LanguageData.PauseWeather_Tooltip: If enabled, map-specific events (like raids, orbital traders) and weather simulation will be paused for non-simulated maps.
LanguageData.PauseMentalState_Tooltip: If enabled, mental breaks, inspirations, and other mood-related events will be paused for pawns in non-active settlements.
LanguageData.PauseAgeing_Tooltip: If enabled, pawns on non-visible maps will not get older.
